vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Freese and Nichols, Inc. to provide additional engineering services required for storm drainage system and erosion control improvements at two locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $154,100.00, from $1,150,646.22 to $1,304,746.22 - Financing: Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($139,100.00) and Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($15,000.00)
